name: helena
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of the US state of Montana: The fire is about 700 miles north of Helena, Montana. Helena, Montana, banned smoking in public places and buildings but the ban was suspended six months later after a legal challenge.
More examplesFewer examplesShe grew up in Helena.He spent five years working as a nurse in Helena.The study was conducted in the American town of Helena, Montana, which has a population of 68,000.The worst contamination in Montana was in Silver Creek, near Helena.
